text.en:
Welcome to Custom Quests. 
This chapter covers the basic usage of this mod. 
For most tasks and rewards, long-press their icon to open their introduction interface.
text.ru:
Welcome to Custom Quests. 
This chapter covers the basic usage of this mod. 
For most tasks and rewards, long-press their icon to open their introduction interface.
text.zh:
欢迎使用Custom Quests。
本章为本模组的基本用法。
对于大部分的任务和奖励，长按其图标可以打开其介绍界面。
